description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nThunder Buddy:
At the start of battle, this creature gains [icons,1976]Lightning Strike. After this creature is killed for the first time, it is resurrected with 100% {STAT_health} and gains a new trait that empowers its [icons,1976]Lightning Strike.
name: Tamed Lightning
